description: All this week, we're talking to musicians about technology. How it's changing their writing, performing, even how they define their art form. Our series is called Playing With Machines. It would be hard to talk about music and tech without talking to Dan Deacon. The Baltimore-based musician has developed a reputation for infectious live performances that include all kinds of technology. We spoke to Dan as he was preparing for a recent show in New York.
title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, May 8, 2014
